name: First Steps (itch)
description:
First Steps is a first-person game about procrastination and attempts to fight it. You traverse a surreal space and try to find an answer to one of the main existential problems many people face nowadays.

This game is inspired a lot by narrative-driven works such as Dear Esther, The Stanley Parable, The Beginner Guide, What Remains of Edith Finch.
If you familiar with these names and/or interested in narrative-focused experimental games, then maybe you can give it a try.
